segments.text: Ah ! No ! Damn it !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a blackout . Now I can't see Seinfeld .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So what ? I just lost one hour's worth of work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? How could you do that ? Don't you save every couple minutes ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I didn't save this time.Damn it ! And I'm sick of writing this paper . Now I have to write it all over again too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've had that problem too many times . So I learned to save.When I'm writing something , I save every three sentences or so . I don't want to lose anything .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hate computers . Sometimes I think they cause more trouble than they're worth .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What are we going to do now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't know . I feel like going out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wonder how much of the city is down .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It doesn't matter . I still can go out and buy a beer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe . But if there's a blackout , probably the pubs are closed.And besides , I know you have a political science exam tomorrow . I thought you had a lot of reading to do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , that's true . Damn ! I just lost half my paper , and now I can't even do my homework.This is a bad time for this to happen .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have a flashlight in my closet . If you want to use that to read , you can .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . I think I will try . Where are you going ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like your idea of getting a beer . I think I'll go out myself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe we can trade.Why don't you stay here and read for my exam , and I'll go drink beer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , it just won't work.If I read for your exam , you won't know the answers tomorrow . I will .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So ? You can go to the class for me.Just write my name on the exam book and take the exam . Why not ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How many students are in the class ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: About fourteen .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So it won't work , old buddy . They'll see that I'm not you . Sorry .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Damn !
segments.speaker: S1
